definition: step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
Xuzhou prefecture level city in Jiangsu
Tsui Hark (1951-), Chinese movie director and producer
Xujiahui, an area in 徐匯區|徐汇区[Xu2 hui4 qu1], Xuhui district, central Shanghai
Xu Beihong (1895-1953), famous European trained painter and influential art teacher
Xuzhou prefecture level city in Jiangsu
Xu Kuangdi (1937-), PRC politician and former mayor of Shanghai
Lin Zexu or Lin Tse-hsu "Commissioner Lin" (1785-1850), Qing official whose anti-opium activities led to first Opium war with Britain 1840-1842
Xuwen county in Zhanjiang 湛江[Zhan4 jiang1], Guangdong
Xu Xiake (1587-1641), Ming dynasty travel writer and geographer, author of Xu Xiake's Travel Diaries 徐霞客遊記|徐霞客游记[Xu2 Xia2 ke4 You2 ji4]

sentences.english: She listened to the deep tone of Xu Huabei's voice.
sentences.chinese: 她听着徐华北低沉的嗓音。

sentences.english: Xu felt that she had tied Liu down and repeatedly asked him, 'Are you regretful?
sentences.chinese: 徐认为，她绑住刘下来，反复问他，你是否有后悔？

sentences.english: Xu told the protestors that the relocation was still in the planning stages.
sentences.chinese: 徐省长告诉上访者说该搬迁方案尚在计划阶段。

sentences.english: Xu never complained about any of this and worked hard to make ends meet.
sentences.chinese: 徐对此从不抱怨，而是尽其所能让一家人可以糊口。

sentences.english: Xu Duoduo said that joining the English club was the best way to improve her English.
sentences.chinese: 徐朵朵说加入英语俱乐部是提高英语的最好办法。

sentences.english: With Mr. Hsi and Prof. Hopkins.
sentences.chinese: 与蒙藏委员会徐科长及霍普金斯教授。

sentences.english: Please contact us first for housing reservation by mobile phone before everyday 8 PM.
sentences.chinese: 欲住宿请于晚上八点前以手机联络徐老爹。

sentences.english: I asked Professor Xu how to improve my English.
sentences.chinese: 我向徐教授请教怎样提高我的英语水平。

sentences.english: Since Dr. Hsu seems to be a stuffed shirt, I try to avoid him.
sentences.chinese: 由于徐医生神气巴拉，我对他避而远之。

sentences.english: Xuzi as case study in this chapter.
sentences.chinese: 本章中选取徐鼒作个案研究。

sentences.english: Mr. Robert, cans I make one request , suh?
sentences.chinese: 先生罗伯特，罐我提出一个请求，徐？

sentences.english: Xu graduated from the Normal, is a version with a local flavor approaching artists.
sentences.chinese: 年毕业于徐师大，是一位带着乡土气息走来的版画家。

sentences.english: He remembered that Xu Huabei's uncle worked at the "A" Committee -was, in fact, a leading cadre there.
sentences.chinese: 他想起徐华北的姑父在A委员会工作，是个领导干部。

sentences.english: China is no longer just a source of cheap labour, says Ms Xu.
sentences.chinese: 徐女士指出，中国已不再只是廉价劳动力来源。

sentences.english: There were obvious tendency of mysticism in Xu Yus aesthetic thinking and literary creation. I Kants and A.
sentences.chinese: 徐的美学思想及文学创作有着明显的神秘主义倾向。

sentences.english: Go to 17-Mile Drive with Dr. & Mrs. Walter Hsu.
sentences.chinese: 与徐灏博士夫妇同游十七哩路。

definition: Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
